languages.text: Ксенос Маражай имел наглость поставить Вольному Торговцу условие — сразиться в финальном бою в туманности Цинерус Малефикум или же продолжать сопротивление рейдам. Выполнение условий врагов Человечества не рекомендуется, однако допустимо, если это означает прекращение постоянных нападений.

The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.
languages.original_text: Ксенос Маражай имел наглость поставить Вольному Торговцу условие — сразиться в финальном бою в туманности Цинерус Малефикум или же продолжать сопротивление рейдам. Выполнение условий врагов Человечества не рекомендуется, однако допустимо, если это означает прекращение постоянных нападений.

traits.locale_text: The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

languages.text: 异形玛拉斋向行商浪人发出了最后通牒，说如果不打算继续拖下去的话，就前往苍灰恶咒星云，进行最终决战。接受人类之敌提出的条件并不明智，但如果这样做可以让持续不断的袭击停下来的话，那这个提议值得考虑。
languages.original_text: The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

traits.locale_text: 异形玛拉斋向行商浪人发出了最后通牒，说如果不打算继续拖下去的话，就前往苍灰恶咒星云，进行最终决战。接受人类之敌提出的条件并不明智，但如果这样做可以让持续不断的袭击停下来的话，那这个提议值得考虑。

languages.text: 異種族マラズハイは、ためらうことなく自由開拓者に最後通牒を突きつけた。サイネラス・マレフィカム星雲で最後の戦いをするか、襲撃をかわし続けるのか。敵が決めた条件に同意するのは良策でないものの、それが絶え間ない攻撃の終結を意味するのであればやむを得ない。
languages.original_text: The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

traits.locale_text: 異種族マラズハイは、ためらうことなく自由開拓者に最後通牒を突きつけた。サイネラス・マレフィカム星雲で最後の戦いをするか、襲撃をかわし続けるのか。敵が決めた条件に同意するのは良策でないものの、それが絶え間ない攻撃の終結を意味するのであればやむを得ない。

languages.text: El xenos Marazhai osa dar un ultimátum a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente: enfrentarse en una última batalla en la nébula Cinerus Maleficum o seguir sufriendo las incursiones. Nunca es buena idea aceptar los términos de los enemigos de la Humanidad, pero es permisible si hacerlo pondrá fin a sus interminables ataques.
languages.original_text: The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

traits.locale_text: El xenos Marazhai osa dar un ultimátum a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente: enfrentarse en una última batalla en la nébula Cinerus Maleficum o seguir sufriendo las incursiones. Nunca es buena idea aceptar los términos de los enemigos de la Humanidad, pero es permisible si hacerlo pondrá fin a sus interminables ataques.

languages.text: Der Xenos Marazhai wagt es, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ein Ultimatum zu stellen ... für eine letzte Schlacht im Cinerus-Maleficum-Nebel oder eine Fortsetzung der Raids. Es ist zwar unklug, die Bedingungen von Feinden der Menschheit zu akzeptieren, aber durchaus statthaft, wenn es die anhaltenden Angriffe beendet.
languages.original_text: The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

traits.locale_text: Der Xenos Marazhai wagt es, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ein Ultimatum zu stellen ... für eine letzte Schlacht im Cinerus-Maleficum-Nebel oder eine Fortsetzung der Raids. Es ist zwar unklug, die Bedingungen von Feinden der Menschheit zu akzeptieren, aber durchaus statthaft, wenn es die anhaltenden Angriffe beendet.

languages.text: Le xénos Marazhai ose lancer un ultimatum {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} : participer à une ultime bataille dans la nébuleuse de Cinerus Maleficum ou continuer à repousser des raids. Il ne serait pas très judicieux d'accepter les conditions dictées par les ennemis de l'humanité, mais c'est envisageable si cela permet de mettre un terme à ces attaques incessantes.
languages.original_text: The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

traits.locale_text: Le xénos Marazhai ose lancer un ultimatum {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} : participer à une ultime bataille dans la nébuleuse de Cinerus Maleficum ou continuer à repousser des raids. Il ne serait pas très judicieux d'accepter les conditions dictées par les ennemis de l'humanité, mais c'est envisageable si cela permet de mettre un terme à ces attaques incessantes.

languages.text: Marazhai isimli zeno, Hür Tacir'e bir ültimatom verme cüreti gösterdi: Cinerus Maleficum nebulasında son bir savaş verilmezse baskınların sonu gelmeyecek. İnsanlığın düşmanlarının koyduğu şartları kabul etmek akıllıca değildir ancak dur durak bilmeyen saldırılara bir son verecekse söz konusu olabilir.
languages.original_text: The xenos Marazhai dares to give the Rogue Trader an ultimatum — fight a final battle in the Cinerus Maleficum nebula or continue fending off raids. It would be unwise to agree to terms set by enemies of Humanity, but it is permissible if it will mean an end to constant attacks.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai ismindeki zeno, Hür Tacir'e bir ültimatom verme cüreti gösterdi: Cinerus Maleficum nebulasında son bir savaş ver yoksa püskürtebileceğin baskınların sonu gelmeyecek. İnsanlığın düşmanlarının koyduğu şartları kabul etmek akıllıca değildir ancak dur durak bilmeyen saldırılara bir son verecekse yine de tercih edilebilir.
